pkgmetadata.longdescription: ASTEVAL provides a numpy-aware, safe(ish) 'eval' functionEmphasis is on mathematical expressions, and so numpy ufuncsare used if available. Symbols are held in the Interpretersymbol table 'symtable': a simple dictionary supporting asimple, flat namespace.Expressions can be compiled into ast node for later evaluation,using the values in the symbol table current at evaluation time.
